## Tallia Rogers – Founder & Lead Instructor

Tallia is a certified yoga and Pilates instructor who founded Nanaimo Wellness Collective to create a calm, non-judgmental space for movement. She combines a background in dance with training in trauma-informed cueing and body-neutral language.

- **Role:** Studio owner, program design, community partnerships  
- **Focus areas:** gentle strength, mobility, and nervous-system regulation  
- **Training:** 200-hour yoga teacher training, mat Pilates certification, workshops in trauma-informed practice  

---

## Calla Mountain – Yoga & Meditation Instructor

Maya specializes in grounding, breath-focused classes that support mental health and stress reduction. Her teaching style is soothing, clear, and accessible for beginners.

- **Role:** Gentle Morning Flow and Evening Restore & Meditation  
- **Focus areas:** mindfulness, breathwork, restorative poses  
- **Training:** 300-hour advanced yoga training with specialization in restorative yoga  

---

## Rachelle Barid – Pilates & Functional Movement Instructor

Jordan brings a functional-movement lens to Pilates, emphasizing joint stability, posture, and everyday strength. He offers clear options so clients can choose what feels best in their bodies.

- **Role:** Strength & Stability (Mat Pilates) and private sessions  
- **Focus areas:** posture, core strength, accessible conditioning  
- **Training:** Certified Pilates instructor, background in kinesiology

## Shared Values

As a team, we are committed to:

- **Inclusivity:** welcoming all bodies, ages, and experience levels  
- **Compassion:** encouraging progress without pressure or shame  
- **Education:** explaining why we choose certain movements or practices  
- **Collaboration:** working with local practitioners and businesses to support holistic wellness in Nanaimo
